entry.title: ã€A week of husband lunch boxesã€‘#37 back to real lifeğŸ¡

media:group.media:title: ã€A week of husband lunch boxesã€‘#37 back to real lifeğŸ¡
media:group.media:description:
*update [ Honey Cherry syrup recipe ] 1 pack cherry 200g honey 1 Tbsp lemon juice
1, Put cherry and honey in the pot
2, Simmer for about 15 min ( gently mix to keep the shape)
3, let it cool down over the night in the fridge and doneâ˜†

[ About bento lunch box ] [ Does my husband heat the bento or eat it cold? ] He eats the bento at room temperature. That is natural things for us. but I know many people (also Japanese) wanna heat it. so I recommend you to use the lunch box that is fine for microwave, if you wanna heat it ;)
